roleset.name: entertain

example.name: transitive, all args
example.text: He regaled Claire with an account of the mock mass performed [*] by thecassocked bloods , which he had had [*T*-1] at firsthand from old Bud Dodington, one of the leaders of the so-called `` Order '' .
example.arg: with an account of the mock mass performed [*] by the cassocked bloods , which he had had [*T*-1] at firsthand from old Bud Dodington , one of the leaders of the so-called `` Order ''

roleset.note: Framed by Neville based on Brown.

predicate.note: Member of VNcls equip-13.4.2-1, but seems inappropriate for this sense.
